item.title: T1 Telephony Has Many Flavors
item.description:
Initially designed for high-volume call transfer between telephone exchanges, T1 technology has evolved into a leading digital phone solution for businesses. If you’re considering T1, understanding the available options is crucial. T1 is a digital standard supporting voice, data, video, or a combination thereof. Originally, it carried 24 separate calls on individual channels called DS0s, collectively forming a T1 line or DS1. Each DS0 transmits digitized voice, call control, and signaling information...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/t1-telephony-has-many-flavors/
